description: A Londo Bell mobile suit intended as another attempt to mass-produces the MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam, after the failure of the RGZ-91 ReGZ. It uses the basic frame of the RGM-89 Jegan, and has a transformation system similar to the MSA-005 Methuss instead of the Back Weapons System(BWS). It is armed with a beam rifle and beam shield, and piloted by Riddhe Marcenas. Equiped with hyper beam rifle, beam rifle and shield
name: RGZ-95 ReZEL (Refined Zeta Gundam Escort Leader)
